Articles.Content:
False, I'm not a dog, I'm a wolf

(ninja, but I don't think Ive blown up that many times.)

The user below me knows kung fu.

False, who needs that when you have rockets?

The user below me plays KSP through Steam.

False, i'm scared if steam can't go online so I can't play KSP

The user below me is scared of the same thing.

False, My steam account is almost always in offline mode.

User below me is traveling at over a 1000 miles per hour.

False, unless you are in the ISS (International Space Station... duh?).

The next user is having more posts than before the disaster. (It's gonna be a long while to chase up my 800 lost posts...)

False.

The person below me has owned a Mac in any point of their life.

False, but you missed "yes" by not saying that someone uses Windows.

The next person uses the operation systems okay for KSP.

Operations systems okay for KSP?

False, unless you are in the ISS (International Space Station... duh?).

Did you forget that motion is relative?

The user below me forgot that motion was relative.

True, I have no idea what that means, anyway

The user below me joined in April according to "Join date"

True, and motion is relative to the point of observation. As in we are moving at over a 1000 mph because of the rotation of the earth.

The user below me can explain the theory of general relativity better then I can.

False, I don't generally explain complicated things well.

The user below me has never been to Dres.

True.

The user below me is on a phone!

False, Window 8 laptop

The user below me is a fan of Chobit's Postcards from Laythe artwork.

False, I don't care for anime. The only animation I care for is Adventure Time.

The user below me loves adventure time (if you don't you are dead to me)

False sorry, I dont even know what it is.

The user below me has ROFL in his name.

WHAAAAAAAAAAT? Learn about it here.

The user below me does watch adventure time.

False.

The user below me have PLAYED Harry Potter as a game.

False.

The user below me has seen a space shuttle launch.

False. But I've replicated it many times in KSP.

The user below me is playing KSP with mods (I am for the first time in 6 months)

True, some things are just plain missing from stock

false
